entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Connectivity.ConnectivityChanged not fired on iOS #28961
  • Change Font in ShellContent TabbedPages #28960
  • Maui Blazor fails loading files with spaces in it on Windows #28959

Closed

  • [BUG] MultiTrigger Conditions all conditions must be true according to docs but that is not the observed behavior #13280
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Testing]Fix some Flaky UI tests that fails on android #28956
    community ✨

Updated

  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for CollectionView Header/Footer Feature #28938
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • Improve iOS CarouselView performance #28955
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [inflight][Windows] Upgrade `Microsoft.Graphics.Win2D` from `1.2.0` to `1.3.2` to fix a build warning #28953
    community ✨
  • [iOS]Fix: FlyoutPage memory leak #28769
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, memory-leak 💦, .NET 9 SR7
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
